name: Newton's Life at Home - Pixel Art Jigsaw Puzzle
name_original: Newton's Life at Home - Pixel Art Jigsaw Puzzle
description:
Newton is a docile and very friendly cat.

He lives in a simple house, but full of things he likes to do.

Every day his owners go out to work and he takes advantage of what he has inside the house to have fun.

When they arrive it is also just fun and joy.

All of these moments were recorded and drawn in pixel art GIFs.

Now it's your turn to assemble all the jigsaw puzzle pieces to find out what Newton likes to do in his day-to-day life, do you accept the challenge?

  • Original soundtrack
  • 5 Pixel art GIFs and originally created for you to assemble
  • 5 different levels of difficulty
